CustomField.description: Its level to display number of parent nodes in node path. With this it can display top most root node and that many immediate parent e.g. /rootnode/…/P2/P1/Node when number of parent nodes in node path = 2.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Its level to display number of parent nodes in node path. With this it can display top most root node and that many immediate parent e.g. /rootnode/…/P2/P1/Node when number of parent nodes in node path = 2.
CustomField.label: Number of Node Path Levels
